    • NUM_MOBS

      public static final MobStore NUM_MOBS
      The number of mobs in the level. This is used to display the number of mobs in the level.

  • Constructor Details

    • GothicCemetery

      public GothicCemetery(GameWorld gameWorld, int levelNumber)
      This is used to create the GothicCemetery environment of a given level.
      Parameters:
      gameWorld - The game world to create the environment in.
      levelNumber - The level number to create the environment for.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the level number is invalid.
